description: A widget to display a text. For images, use ImageView.

alignment.description: The horizontal alignment of the text.

markupEnabled.description:
Allows for a subset of HTML tags in the text. Supported tags are: `a`, `del`, `ins`, `b`, `i`, `strong`, `em`, `big`, `small`, `br`. All tags must be closed (e.g. use `
` instead of `
`). Nesting tags is currently not supported.

maxLines.description: Limit the number of lines to be displayed to the given maximum. `null` disables this limit.

lineSpacing.description: The amount of space between each line of text. The `lineSpacing` property is a factor with a default value of `1.0`.
